scripts.test: npm run build:d && php artisan cache:clear
scripts.build:css: gulp --env=dev sass && gulp --env=dev rev && gulp --env=dev post_build && node manifest && node verifyAssets && php artisan cache:clear
scripts.build:js: webpack -d --progress --colors && gulp --env=dev rev_js && gulp --env=dev post_build && node manifest && node verifyAssets && php artisan cache:clear
scripts.build:d: gulp --env=dev cleanup && webpack -d --progress --colors && gulp default --env=dev && gulp --env=dev rev && gulp --env=dev rev_js && gulp --env=dev post_build && node manifest && node verifyAssets
scripts.build:p: npm run pre-prod && npm run enable-maintenance && gulp --env=prod cleanup && webpack -p --progress --colors && gulp --env=prod && gulp --env=prod rev && gulp license --env=prod && gulp --env=prod rev_js && gulp --env=prod post_build && node manifest && node verifyAssets && npm run optimize && npm run disable-maintenance
scripts.optimize: php artisan view:clear && php artisan config:cache && php artisan route:cache && composer install --optimize-autoloader --no-dev
scripts.enable-maintenance: php artisan down --message="We are undergoing routine maintenance." --retry=300 --allow=127.0.0.1
scripts.disable-maintenance: php artisan up && npm run reset-opcache
scripts.pre-prod: php artisan view:clear && php artisan cache:clear && npm run reset-opcache && composer dump-autoload --optimize
